title: Brentford winger Sergi Canos SHOVED over advertising hoardings by Bristol City defender Jack Hunt
text:
Brentford winger Sergi Canos was shoved over the advertising hoardings by Bristol City defender Jack Hunt on Wednesday.

Hunt was provoked by Canos who ran into him as the ball went out of play during the 1-1 draw.

The City right back reacted angrily and pushed the winger into the crowd.

Scroll down for video.

Jack Hunt was provoked by Sergi Canos who ran into him as the ball went out of play

The City right back reacted angrily and pushed the winger over the advertising hoardings

Match referee Oliver Langford booked both players involved as tempers flared on Wednesday

Match referee Oliver Langford booked both players involved as tempers flared during the Championship clash.

Andreas Weimann struck late on to extend City's unbeaten run in the Championship to nine games against Brentford.

The Austrian international met a cross from the right on 87 minutes to steer a header past David Raya and deny Thomas Frank's men the three points their performance merited at Griffin Park.

It had looked for all the world as though Brentford would become just the second side to inflict defeat on Bristol City this season thanks to a moment of magic from Joshua Dasilva, but a late lapse at the back proved costly.

The Robins could have moved into the play-off places with a victory, but instead had to settle for keeping their impressive streak intact.

😮 "It's like watching the wrestling!" 🤼‍♂️



Things certainly got feisty between @BristolCity defender Jack Hunt and @BrentfordFC winger Sergi Canos this evening!



📲 READ MORE - https://t.co/rqvjpVRPs5 pic.twitter.com/sjtGNLGYKR — Sky Sports Football (@SkyFootball) October 2, 2019
description: Brentford winger Sergi Canos was shoved over the advertising hoardings by Bristol City defender Jack Hunt on Wednesday. Hunt was provoked by Canos who ran into him.
